mapper.select: SELECT mprofileno, file1, file1saved, thumbfile, filesize, memberno FROM memberprofile WHERE memberno = #{memberno} ORDER BY mprofileno ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM memberprofile WHERE memberno=#{memberno} AND mprofileno!=#{mprofileno}
DELETE FROM memberprofile WHERE memberno=#{memberno} AND mprofileno=#{mprofileno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO memberprofile(mprofileno, file1, file1saved, thumbfile, filesize, memberno) VALUES (memberprofile_seq.nextval, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumbfile}, #{filesize}, #{memberno})
